name: Sourcing Services Agreement Execution
description: Finalise and execute multi-year Sourcing Services Agreement covering scope, fees, and T&Cs.

name: Service Scope Definition
description: Confirm which of the 4 pillars (Source, Develop, Execute, Support) are in scope for the client.

name: Client System Requirements Alignment
description: Map client ERP, data formats, reporting templates, and approval workflows to Surity processes.

name: Client Supply Chain Requirements Capture
description: Document pallet specs, container loading rules, labelling standards, and documentation templates.
kpi: Requirements captured and distributed to ops

name: Communication Plan Definition
description: Define reporting frequency, format, escalation paths, and key contacts for each client project.
informed: Head of Quality, Head of Operation

name: Scope Change Request Processing
description: Formal process for handling contractual and commercial scope changes from client. Technical specification changes are managed through QA; forecast adjustments through Supply Chain.
kpi: Change requests processed within 3 working days

name: Client Satisfaction Survey Execution
description: Systematic collection and action planning on client feedback and satisfaction metrics.
kpi: Survey completion rate >80%; action plan within 10 days

name: HS Code Classification & FTA Analysis
description: HS code classification support, rules of origin analysis for FTAs, and tariff mitigation strategies.

name: Supplier Capability Categorisation
description: Categorise suppliers by capability tier (Tier 1 = full in-house tooling + R&D; Tier 3 = assembly-only).

name: Cost-Quality-Lead Time Dashboard
description: Visual dashboards showing cost-quality-lead time trade-offs by product sub-category and origin.

name: Pre-Market Compliance Gap Analysis
description: Gap analysis for EU GPSR, UKCA, REACH, FDA; RSL/MSDS management and chemical compliance roadmap.

name: End-to-End Cost Simulation
description: Full cost simulation: ex-works, freight, insurance, duties, inbound logistics, quality failure costs, inventory holding.
kpi: TLC model accuracy within 3% of actual

name: Product Redesign for Savings
description: Proactive redesign of existing products for material savings, simplified assembly, or sustainability.

name: New Category Risk Assessment
description: Assess technical complexity, supplier availability, and compliance risks for new categories.
consulted: Head of Quality, Category Sourcing Manager

name: Supplier Capability Cross-Match
description: Leverage existing supplier relationships across multiple categories and retailers.

name: Supplier Base Consolidation
description: Help clients reduce supplier base while improving quality and service through strategic consolidation.
kpi: Vendor count reduction vs quality/service metrics

name: Buying Trip Facilitation
description: Facilitate buying trips and co-creation sessions between the retailer's buying team and top-tier suppliers.
kpi: Workshop output: concepts progressed to development

name: New Factory Registration & Risk Assessment
description: Standardised process for new factory registration including initial risk assessment.

name: Vendor KPI Tracking & Review
description: Track on-time delivery, quality yield, responsiveness KPIs and conduct regular performance reviews.

name: Strategic Vendor Engagement
description: Strategic engagement with key vendors for capacity planning, cost reduction, and innovation.

name: Qualified Vendor Database Management
description: Dynamic management of the qualified vendor database by category and capability.
kpi: ASL accuracy and currency; quarterly review

name: Vendor Capability Improvement Initiatives
description: Initiatives to help key suppliers improve quality systems, sustainability, or technical capabilities.

name: QMS Documentation Management
description: Maintain documented framework for all quality activities, policies and manuals.

name: SOP Maintenance & Distribution
description: Detailed instructions for inspections, testing protocols, and non-conformance handling.

name: Root Cause Analysis & Corrective Action
description: Structured process for root cause analysis and implementing fixes for quality failures.
kpi: CAPA closure rate within target timeframe

name: Agency Process Audit Execution
description: Regular audits of internal processes to ensure compliance with Quality, ESG and strategic differentiation.
kpi: Audit schedule adherence; finding closure rate

name: Testing Equipment Calibration
description: Manage calibration schedules for any agency-owned testing or measuring equipment.

name: Regulatory Change Monitoring
description: Monitor and interpret changes in EU/UK/AU regulations (REACH, RoHS, GPSR, UKCA, Prop 65, packaging laws).

name: Certification Lifecycle Management
description: Manage process for obtaining and maintaining required certifications (CE, UKCA, GS, RCM, WaterMark).

name: Restricted Substances Compliance
description: Maintain and communicate client RSL to suppliers and verify compliance.

name: Import/Export Regulation Adherence
description: Ensure adherence to import/export regulations, sanctions, and anti-boycott rules.

name: ESG Framework Maintenance
description: Define the agency's stance and client-specific requirements on environmental and social governance.
kpi: Annual ESG policy review and update

name: Environmental Metrics Tracking
description: Track and report on carbon footprint, recycled content, and packaging waste metrics.

name: Worker Welfare & Modern Slavery Due Diligence
description: Worker well-being initiatives, grievance mechanisms, and modern slavery due diligence.

name: Material-Specific Environmental Standards
description: Manage FSC certification for wood, organic cotton standards, and other material-specific environmental requirements.

name: Commercial Structure Management
description: Define and manage commercial structure (retainer, % of order value, fixed fee per project).

name: Operational Budget Management
description: Manage the agency's own operational cost budgets and forecasts.

name: Client Fee Invoicing
description: Manage invoicing and collection of agency fees from retailers.

name: Client Creditworthiness Assessment
description: Assess client creditworthiness and manage contract terms.

name: Job Description & Competency Mapping
description: Clear job descriptions for all roles including Sourcing, QA, Supply Chain, and support functions.

name: Staff Training Delivery
description: Ongoing training on regulations, inspection techniques, negotiation skills, and category expertise.
kpi: Training hours per employee per year

name: Individual Performance Review
description: Link individual performance to project and agency goals.
consulted: Sourcing Director, Head of Quality, Head of Operation

name: Secure Data & Communication Management
description: Manage secure communication and data storage for protecting client IP and supplier data.
kpi: Zero security breaches; annual pen test

name: L1/L2 Support & Vendor Contracts
description: Level 1 and Level 2 support management and technology supplier contracts.

name: Core System Maintenance
description: Maintain core operational software for tracking orders, finances, and projects.

name: Technical Knowledge Repository
description: Central repository for technical specs, material data, testing standards, and market trends.

name: Project Success & Failure Capture
description: Capture project successes and failures to prevent repeat mistakes.

name: Version Control & Document Archival
description: Manage version control for all critical documents (specs, artwork, contracts, test reports).

name: Market Trend & Cost Tracking
description: Track raw material price fluctuations, logistics costs, foreign exchange rates, and competitor product launches.

name: Reference Data Management
description: Reference data management in Core ERP, Audit and Finance Systems.

name: Brief Receipt & Logging
description: Receive and log client project brief covering product type, specification, quality, and timeline.

name: Cross-Team Brief Alignment
description: Review brief and align understanding across Sourcing, QA, and Commercial teams.
consulted: Head of Quality, Head of Operation

name: Macro Project CPA Agreement
description: Agree macro Critical Path Analysis covering Asia and Europe milestones.

name: Store Sample Receipt
description: Receive store samples from client for reference (if applicable).

name: QA Definition Receipt
description: Receive QA definition from client specifying quality requirements (if applicable).
kpi: QA definition confirmed within 3 working days

name: Competitor Product Analysis
description: Reverse-engineer competitor products covering price, quality, features, and packaging from retail shelves.
kpi: Benchmark reports per category per season

name: Emerging Manufacturer Identification
description: Identify emerging manufacturers or niche specialists not yet on the client's radar.

name: Regional Manufacturing Capability Assessment
description: Deep-dive reports on manufacturing hubs covering cluster strengths, logistics readiness, labour costs, and risk scoring.
kpi: Playbook refreshed annually per active region

name: Range Gap Identification
description: Identify gaps in the client's current range where the agency can add value.

name: Rapid-Turnaround Development
description: Rapid development for limited-edition or campaign-driven products.

name: Specification Set Up
description: Set up product specifications to guide vendor search and evaluation.
kpi: Spec document issued within 3 working days

name: Tender Document Preparation
description: Prepare tender document covering Sourcing and QA requirements.

name: Sourcing Trip & Kick-Off Meeting
description: Conduct sourcing trip and kick-off meeting for major projects.

name: Vendor Search & Identification
description: Search and identify potential vendors by product family, geography, and capability.

name: Initial Vendor Evaluation & Factory Visit
description: Conduct initial vendor evaluation including factory visit by Sourcing and QA.
kpi: Factory visit report within 3 working days

name: Vendor Profile Collection & Review
description: Collect and review vendor profiles against qualification criteria.

name: Vendor Short List Confirmation
description: Confirm short list of qualified vendors for the project.
kpi: Short list confirmed within CPA timeline

name: Buying Sample Request & Evaluation
description: Request and evaluate buying samples from shortlisted vendors.

name: Tender Release
description: Release tender to qualified vendors.

name: Vendor Quotation Receipt
description: Receive and log vendor quotations.

name: Quotation Benchmarking & 1st Round Negotiation
description: Benchmark competing quotations and conduct first round of commercial negotiation.

name: DC Cost Estimation
description: Estimate landed/DC cost for client evaluation.

name: Product Short List Confirmation
description: Confirm product short list from sourcing evaluation.
kpi: Short list confirmed within CPA timeline

name: Proposal Submission to Client
description: Submit sourcing proposal to client in response to brief.

name: Range Selection Trip & Confirmation
description: Conduct sourcing trip for range selection and confirmation.

name: Buying Sample Submission
description: Submit buying samples to client for final evaluation.

name: Buyer Feedback Processing
description: Process and action buyer feedback on proposal.

name: Proposal Amendment & Resubmission
description: Amend, update, and resubmit proposal based on client feedback.

name: 2nd Round Vendor Negotiation
description: Conduct 2nd round negotiation with vendor on tender result (if required).

name: Final Quotation Confirmation
description: Confirm final quotation with all commercial terms agreed.

name: Range Confirmation with Revised Forecast
description: Confirm range with revised SKU-level forecast from client.

name: Quotation Data Validation
description: Validate quotation data using macro-enabled form checks for completeness and accuracy.

name: Factory Profile Report Preparation
description: Step 1: Vendor submits Factory Profile Report for desk-top review.

name: Audit Planning & Scheduling
description: Plan and schedule Surity Technical and CSR audits.
kpi: Audit scheduled within 10 days of profile approval

name: On-Site 5 Pillars Assessment
description: Step 2: Conduct Surity Audit covering 5 Compliance Pillars on-site.

name: Audit Report Preparation
description: Prepare detailed audit report with findings, scoring, and recommendations.
kpi: Report issued within 5 working days of audit

name: CSR Audit Body Selection
description: Step 3: Select appropriate CSR audit body (BSCI/SEDEX/SA8000/ICS).
kpi: Audit body selected per client requirements

name: CSR Audit Coordination
description: Coordinate CSR audit execution between vendor and audit body.
kpi: CSR audit completed within 30 days of booking

name: Audit Grading & Result
description: Grade vendor based on Surity Audit + CSR Audit results; determine re-audit cycle (1-4 years).
kpi: Grading completed within 3 days of report

name: Corrective Action Plan Issuance
description: Issue CAP for non-conformances found during audit.
kpi: CAP closure rate within agreed timeline

name: Buying Agreement Execution
description: Step 4: Execute Buying Agreement covering terms, T&Cs, and Ops Manual acknowledgement.

name: Vendor System Registration
description: Register vendor on 3PL system with unique ID and password setup.

name: Technical Product Specification Compilation
description: Compile TPS covering all product parameters, materials, and performance requirements.
kpi: TPS completed before Silver Seal submission

name: BOM/CDF/Drawing Collation
description: Collate Bill of Materials, Component Data Forms, and technical drawings.

name: Product Complexity Classification
description: Classify product as Low, Standard, or High complexity.

name: General Quality Standards Assignment
description: Assign applicable General Quality Standards (GQS) to the product.

name: General Product Specification Creation
description: Create GPS following Input - Draft - Validate - Confirm workflow.
kpi: GPS signed off before Silver Seal

name: Defect Classification List Creation
description: Create DCL defining critical, major, and minor defect criteria.

name: Silver Seal Sample Submission
description: Vendor submits Silver Seal samples for initial product assessment.

name: Silver Seal Review & Assessment
description: Assess Silver Seal sample against GPS/GQS criteria.

name: Pre-Production Testing
description: Commission 3rd party testing for safety, EMC, FFU, and chemical compliance.
kpi: Test reports received within 15 working days

name: Test Reports Collection & Validation
description: Collect test reports and validate lab accreditation and methodology.
kpi: 100% of reports validated before Gold Seal

name: Certificates Collection
description: Collect all required product and component certificates.

name: Declaration of Conformity Preparation
description: Prepare CE/UKCA Declaration of Conformity.

name: REACH/RoHS/WEEE Compliance Check
description: Verify regulatory compliance for REACH, RoHS, WEEE, ErP, WaterMark, WELS.

name: Gold Seal Sample Submission
description: Vendor submits 3 production samples for Gold Seal assessment.

name: Gold Seal Assessment & Inspection
description: Assess Gold Seal: tech file complete, Silver CAP closed, packaging approved, no deviations.

name: Dimension/Material/Weight Data Validation
description: Validate all physical data against specifications.

name: Manage Reject Loops
description: Manage Silver/Gold Seal rejection, CAP issuance, vendor revision, and re-assessment cycle.
kpi: Reject loop closure within 10 working days

name: Gold Seal Sign-Off & Distribution
description: Sign off Gold Seal and distribute to Surity, client, and factory with reference numbers.
kpi: Sign-off within 2 working days of assessment pass

name: Gold Seal Storage
description: Store Gold Seal reference sample for minimum 2-year retention.

name: Product Amendment Management
description: Manage change control: retest, new Gold Seal for product amendments.

name: Repeat Order Compliance Verification
description: Verify that repeat orders still comply with original Gold Seal approval; check for spec changes, test report validity, and certification currency before reorder.

name: Brand Requirements Confirmation
description: Confirm client brand guidelines and packaging standards.
kpi: Brand brief confirmed before artwork starts

name: Packaging Format Confirmation
description: Confirm packaging format selection (box/open/blister/polybag/shrink).

name: Packaging Brief Release to Vendor
description: Issue packaging brief to vendor covering format, materials, and policy requirements.

name: Packaging Material Selection
description: Specify packaging materials (paper/plastic/corrugated) with weight thresholds.

name: Packaging Testing & Validation
description: Test packaging per GPS requirements.

name: Environmental Packaging Optimisation
description: Review recyclability, FSC/PEFC certification, and plastic policy compliance.

name: Packaging Data Collection & Vendor Declaration
description: Collect packaging data and vendor environmental declarations.

name: AWCL Preparation
description: Prepare Artwork Checklist covering marketing copy, technical symbols, and dimensions.

name: AWCL Vendor Completion
description: Send AWCL to vendor for completion with product-specific data.

name: Artwork Creation
description: Generate artwork via Surity-approved agency or vendor in-house design team.

name: Die Cut Submission & Approval
description: Submit die cut (AI format, 100% scale, panel labelling) for approval.
kpi: Die cut approved within 3 working days

name: Product Photo Submission & Approval
description: Submit product photos (300dpi TIF, background removed) for artwork inclusion.

name: Barcode Verification
description: Verify barcode format, grade, and readability.

name: Regulatory Symbol Placement
description: Place CE, UKCA, RCM, WEEE, ErP, FSC symbols per regulation requirements.

name: Artwork Review & Approval Cycle
description: Surity review and client approval cycle for artwork drafts.

name: Print Proof Submission & Approval
description: Submit print proof for colour, barcode grade, and print quality checklist review.
kpi: Print proof approved within 3 working days

name: Translation Pack with Manual & Labels
description: Prepare translation pack including instruction manual and label text for all markets.
kpi: Translation pack completed within CPA timeline

name: Final Artwork Sign Off
description: Final sign-off on all artwork before print authorisation.

name: Carton Marking Specification
description: Apply inner/outer carton mark and pallet label templates.

name: IM Brief & Template Issuance
description: Issue instruction manual brief and format template to vendor.
kpi: Brief issued within 3 working days of GPS

name: Instruction Manual Origination
description: Vendor drafts English version covering content, visuals, and format.

name: English Version Creation & Review
description: Surity reviews English manual for content, accuracy, compliance, and copy quality including grammar, spelling, and clarity for non-native speakers.

name: Master Manual Approval
description: Approve format template for multi-SKU ranges.

name: Translation Commissioning
description: Commission translations via approved agency for all destination market languages.

name: Final IM Approval & Print Authorisation
description: Final approval and print authorisation for instruction manual.

name: Outline Quotation Processing
description: Process outline quotation with minimum data for in-store cost estimate.

name: Full Quotation Processing
description: Process full quotation with all statutory and system setup data.

name: Product Data Confirmation
description: Confirm all product master data for accuracy.

name: Product Master Data Upload to Client Systems
description: Upload product master data to client ERP/systems.

name: Product Marketing Data Upload
description: Upload marketing data (images, descriptions, features) to client systems.

name: Product Live in Client ERP
description: Activate product in client ERP systems for ordering.
kpi: Product live within 2 working days of upload

name: Proforma Order Generation & Issuance
description: Generate and issue proforma order to vendor.

name: Vendor Order Confirmation
description: Receive vendor order confirmation within 3 working days; note amendments.

name: Official Order Issuance
description: Issue official order as binding contract.
kpi: Official order issued within 2 days of confirmation

name: Lead Time Confirmation
description: Confirm lead times (first order vs repeat order).

name: Order Amendment Management
description: Process and manage order amendments through formal change control.

name: NPD Design Sign Off
description: Sign off NPD design before tooling release.

name: NPD Tooling Release
description: Authorise tooling production for NPD.

name: NPD ESL Stage
description: Engineering Sample Lot: sample check and testing.

name: NPD Tooling Amendment (ESL)
description: Amend tooling based on ESL testing results.

name: Pilot Production Run
description: Execute pilot production run for validation.

name: Mass Production Release
description: Mass production is authorised upon Gold Seal approval and order confirmation. Monitor production start and progress.

name: DUPRO Inspection Execution
description: During-production inspection at 10-20% completion.
kpi: DUPRO pass rate; issues identified early

name: Production Status Tracking
description: Monitor production progress against schedule.

name: FRI Booking
description: Book Final Random Inspection with agency 10 working days before LRD.

name: FRI Execution
description: Execute FRI at 100% complete / 80% packed per AQL ISO 2859.

name: FRI Report Review
description: Review FRI report and determine pass/fail/pending status.

name: First Production Run Lab Testing
description: Commission 3rd party lab testing for safety-critical items on first production run.

name: Self-Inspection Qualification & Execution
description: Qualify and manage factory self-inspection for approved vendors.

name: Self-Inspection Report & Guarantee Letter
description: Receive self-inspection report and guarantee letter from vendor.

name: Inspection Certificate Issuance
description: Issue inspection certificate to authorise shipment release.
kpi: Certificate issued within 1 working day of pass

name: Inspection Cost Allocation
description: Allocate inspection costs (Surity years 1-2 primary factories; vendor thereafter).

name: DCL Definition
description: Define Defect Classification List for freight/loading inspection.

name: 3PL Registration
description: Register vendor on 3PL online booking system.

name: Online Booking Submission
description: Submit shipment booking online 15 calendar days before shipment.

name: Container Booking (FCL/LCL)
description: Book container allocation based on volume requirements.

name: Shipping Order Release
description: Release shipping order for loading.

name: Loading Supervision
description: Supervise container loading (loose fill or pallet).

name: Loading Photo Documentation
description: Capture and submit photo evidence of container loading.
kpi: Photos submitted within 24 hours of loading

name: Loading Approval & Shipment Release
description: Confirm loading standards met and release shipment.

name: Mixed Loading Management
description: Manage sequential order loading for mixed containers.

name: Pallet Specification Confirmation
description: Confirm pallet specs by market (Europe/UK/Australia/NZ).

name: Pallet Loading Compliance
description: Verify 1 SKU per pallet, shrink wrap, corner protectors, banding compliance.

name: Pallet Label Application
description: Apply pallet labels per specification.

name: Container Height Compliance Check
description: Check single/double stack compliance against height limits.

name: FCL Delivery to CY/CFS
description: Deliver FCL to Container Yard or Container Freight Station (minimum CBM verification).

name: LCL Delivery to 3PL Warehouse
description: Deliver LCL cargo to 3PL warehouse (7 days free storage).

name: ETD Confirmation
description: Confirm Estimated Time of Departure.

name: Late Shipment Notification & Penalty Management
description: Manage late shipment notifications and penalty processes.

name: Volume Deviation Approval
description: Approve deviations from ordered volumes.

name: Commercial Invoice Preparation
description: Prepare commercial invoice per order and shipping terms.

name: Packing List Preparation
description: Prepare packing list per container with full measurement/weight data.

name: Bill of Lading / FCR Preparation
description: Prepare Bill of Lading, FCR, or Sea Waybill.
kpi: Document issued within 3 working days of sailing

name: Certificate of Origin / GSP Preparation
description: Prepare Certificate of Origin or GSP Form A.

name: Fumigation Certificate / Self-Declaration
description: Prepare fumigation certificate or self-declaration as required.

name: Packing Declaration (AU/NZ)
description: Prepare Packing Declaration or Annual Packing Declaration for Australia/NZ.

name: Document Accuracy Check & Consistency Validation
description: Cross-check PO, packing list, and invoice for consistency.

name: T/T Document Submission
description: Submit documents for Open Account (T/T) payment processing.
kpi: Documents submitted within 13 days of ETD

name: D/A or L/C Document Submission
description: Submit documents for Documents Against Acceptance or Letter of Credit processing.

name: Payment Authorisation
description: Authorise payment release upon document verification.

name: CAP Preparation
description: Prepare Corrective Action Plan for non-conformances found post-delivery.

name: CAP Validation
description: Validate vendor's response to CAP and verify corrective actions.

name: RTV Collection
description: Coordinate Return to Vendor collection from destination (35-day window).

name: RTV Disposal
description: Arrange disposal of non-conforming goods where RTV is not viable.

name: Cost Recovery Notification & Settlement
description: Issue cost recovery notification and settle within 7-day payment window.

name: Force Majeure Assessment
description: Assess whether non-compliance qualifies as force majeure.

name: Legal Dispute Management
description: Manage formal legal dispute resolution process.
